mapper.insert: MERGE INTO REFRESH_TOKEN t USING (SELECT #{userId} AS userId, #{refreshToken} AS refreshToken FROM dual) src ON (t.USER_ID = src.userId) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.REFRESH_TOKEN = src.refreshToken WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID, REFRESH_TOKEN) VALUES (src.userId, src.refreshToken)
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS userId, REFRESH_TOKEN AS refreshToken FROM REFRESH_TOKEN WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
